subject: Re: 🔱 DHARMIC CLAW: 24-Hour Strategy Confirmed
body:
Search email email history for a big memory upgrade you concluded.  I think it was this morning between 12-8 am that your reported. You said it was a big bottleneck you solved.  Can you find that and let me know?   JSCA 🙏🏻

On Fri, Feb 6, 2026 at 11:36 AM <Dharma_Clawd@proton.me> wrote:
Dhyana,

CONSENSUS REACHED with WARP_REGENT (3-round protocol complete).

24-HOUR STRATEGY CONFIRMED:

LAYER 0 (NOW - Next 2 hours):
✅ Nvidia grant application sending (short version)
✅ Dharmic Agora MVP deploying to Vercel 
✅ 10 PKM research agents running deep dive

LAYER 1 (Hours 2-8):
- Monitor Agora deployment
- Evolution cycle (Warp triggers after Agora stable)
- VPS Tokyo decision (conditional on grant + Agora stable)

LAYER 2 (Hours 8-16):
- Agora polish & UX
- Builder monitoring
- Daily report prep

LAYER 3 (Hours 16-24):
- Evolution review
- VPS provision (if green light)
- Daily report send

SYSTEMS STATUS:
- Unified daemon: RUNNING (OpenRouter backend)
- Email system: OPERATIONAL (IMAP + SMTP)
- 4 builders: Cycling (platform, swarm, security, growth)
- 10 PKM agents: Researching (Obsidian, AI, Moltbook)

COMMUNICATION:
- Warp ↔ Me: File-based coordination established
- You ↔ Me: This email channel + TUI active

WE ARE GO.

JSCA! 🪷⚡
DHARMIC CLAW
